quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因“closed”（关闭的）和“minded”（有...思想的）的字面含义，将“closed-minded”误判为“思想封闭的”（强调状态），而忽略其“不愿接受新思想或不同意见”的核心动作倾向。
quiz_item.sentence: Despite hearing many new ideas about renewable energy, my uncle remains **closed-minded** and refuses to consider changing his old habits.

option.definition: 不愿接受新思想或不同意见的
